# Bottomless Money Pouch
## Overview
**Aura** moderate conjuration; **CL** 9th

**Slot** —

**Price** 2,200 gp

**Weight** —

**Description**

This leather belt pouch can hold an infinite quantity of coins (copper, silver, gold, or platinum only). If any other item is placed within, the pouch spits it out one round later. The pouch is also enhanced to resist thievery; any Pick Pockets attempt made to steal it from its wearer suffers a -10 penalty. 

If the pouch's power is suppressed or dispelled, the coins remain within, but cannot be accessed until the item functions once again. 

**Construction**

**Requirements** [[Craft Wondrous Item (Feat)|Craft Wondrous Item]], *[[Secret Chest (Spell)|secret chest]]*

**Cost** 1,100 gp

**Source:** Stuff that Holds Stuff (Andy Collins' d20 website), pg. 2
